Ice troll males inhabit the islands north of Jatizso and Neitiznot and can also be found in the Chaos Tunnels. They use melee attacks that hit a maximum of 196 life points. Yak hide armour is especially effective against them, as the armour lowers their maximum hit.

Rare drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable
Mimic kill token (m)11/10,00095,216Not alchemisable

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Slayer of Chaos ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Keldagrim.
    • Granite shield drop
  • Yak Attack ( 10) – Wear yak-hide armour and kill an ice troll.

Graphical updates[edit | edit source]

  • Ice troll male after 6 February 2007 (update)

  • Ice troll male after 15 March 2011 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 6 February 2007 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Players who have done the Fremennik Isles quest can make their own yak-hide armour using items easily obtained on Neitiznot. This armour is very inexpensive and has good damage-stopping properties against trolls.
